column2: This game is the best thing in my life right now. Thanks Play2Learn!
I'm a genius now. 1 + 1? Easy! Thanks Play2Learn!
Anagram Hunt has redefined who I am as a person. I can't imagine living without it.
If you''re not on this website playing Math Facts, then what are you even doing with your life?
Anagram Hunt is the most rewarding thing I have ever experienced. Ever.
What an enriching and fulfilling way to spend my entire Sunday.
Since I started using Play2Learn, I''ve become smarter than all my friends! Time for some new friends!
I''ve become so addicted to Anagram Hunt, I barely see my family anymore!
I was having so much fun playing Math Facts, I LITERALLY passed out!
I can now rearrange this sentence I am typing into:  coin naw rager near hist continent see I gym pin at pitying moat in!
